title: "The Americans" Showrunners talk Russia, Reagan and the perils of period TV
description: Joe Weisberg and Joel Fields, the creative duo behind the hit FX TV show "The Americans" discuss how their show came about, and why it's harder to tell a tale about Russian spying, now that the story is in the news.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
